dct_description_sm: In: Atlas Minimus or A Book of Geography Shewing all the Empires, Monarchies Kingdomes, Regions Dominions Principalities and Countries, in the whole World , Map [44]/ by John Seller, Hydrographer to the King. -- Scales differ. -- And are Sold at his House at the Hermitage in Wapping, and in Pope's head Alley in Cornhill London : John Seller,[1679]. 1 miniature atlas (109 p.) : [53] maps ; 11.2 x 7.6 cm.
California as an island with indented northern coast and no place names.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
